title: through out error after launch training
body:
The training can be launch but after some time it will always broken. The output looks like this: 
epoch 1  step 100  loss 0.38945767 - time per batch 0.7466
epoch 1  step 200  loss 0.35924491 - time per batch 0.7320
epoch 1  step 300  loss 0.30920124 - time per batch 0.7341
epoch 1  step 400  loss 0.33160126 - time per batch 0.7358
epoch 1  step 500  loss 0.26348481 - time per batch 0.7488
epoch 1  step 600  loss 0.29087356 - time per batch 0.7309
epoch 1  step 700  loss 0.28754801 - time per batch 0.7214
epoch 1  step 800  loss 0.29944807 - time per batch 0.7104
epoch 2  step 900  loss 0.35306743 - time per batch 0.7574
epoch 2  step 1000  loss 0.29768047 - time per batch 0.6788
Testing...
epoch 2  step 1000  loss 0.30430112 - time per batch 0.6081
epoch 2  step 1100  loss 0.32437494 - time per batch 0.6688
epoch 2  step 1200  loss 0.28164327 - time per batch 0.7153
Exception ignored in: <bound method Image.__del__ of <tkinter.PhotoImage object at 0x7feca4155c18>>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/hwq/anaconda3/envs/pytf/lib/python3.6/tkinter/__init__.py", line 3507, in __del__
    self.tk.call('image', 'delete', self.name)
RuntimeError: main thread is not in main loop
Tcl_AsyncDelete: async handler deleted by the wrong thread
Aborted (core dumped)
